system.description: The character is a skilled hand-to-hand combatant, able to deliver devastating unarmed strikes with speed and precision.
system.benefit: Character can make a Fient Action as a Free Action when also making an Unarmed All-Out Attack or Standard Attack Action. Additionally, they make Unarmed Called Shot Actions as Half Actions.

specialAbilities.name: Pugilist Combat
specialAbilities.description: You can make a Feint Action as a Free Action when making an Unarmed All-Out Attack or Standard Attack Action. Additionally, you make Unarmed Called Shot Actions as Half Actions instead of Full Actions.
